parameters.name: ToleranceIDArray
parameters.description: Type of tolerance you want to set as defined in swTolerances_e

parameters.name: ToleranceValueArray
parameters.description: New tolerance value in meters for the specified tolerance type

parameters.name: NumTol
parameters.description: Original value of the specified tolerance type

signature:

   ref System.Int32

,
   ref System.Double
ToleranceValueArray
,
   System.Int32
NumTol
)
